alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Evangeline; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Southern Jefferson Davis; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:20PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Rapides, central Jefferson Davis, northwestern Evangeline, eastern Beauregard, Calcasieu, southeastern Vernon and Allen Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 420 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lecompte to near Allen Parish Airport to near Harmony to near Iowa. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Oakdale, Westlake, Welsh, Iowa, Kinder, Oberlin, Glenmora, Elizabeth, Turkey Creek, Fenton, Reeves, Hayes, Moss Bluff, Sugartown, Mittie, Dry Creek, Ragley and Lake Charles Regional Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 16 and 57. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 12. Interstate 49 between mile markers 55 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Evangeline; Northern Jefferson Davis; Rapides; Southern Jefferson Davis; Vernon
